Blessed Cloak Part.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Blessed Cloak.Name: Blessed Cloak
Blessed Cloak.DetailedDescription: A cloak designed to give praise to the Dev Gods, it features gems outlining the edges of the orange and yellow fabric, representing fire. In the center is their class, requesting a prayer to buff their stats, but nerf the class they dislike the most. Some users sew designs of hammers, silouettes of girls, meat, or foam darts into the free space.
Blessed Cloak.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Game updates/2018-06-30|June 30th, 2018 game update]].

Celestial Bracers.Name: Celestial Bracers
Celestial Bracers.FreeTextOverview: This item was renamed to Celestial Bracers from Celestial Gloves shortly after the release of T4 :Bookorange: items.

Champion Blade.Name: Champion Blade
Champion Blade.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Advanced Crafting]] update.

Champion Sword Recipe.Name: Champion Sword Recipe
Champion Sword Recipe.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Advanced Crafting]] update.

Champion Sword.Name: Champion Sword
Champion Sword.DetailedDescription: A sword with high honors, it has a mithril core with an edge made of ruby. The outer metal holster has a brilliant silver sheen, outlined by the red of the cutting edge. About 4 feet long, the daunting blade is considered a longsword. With a pure gold crossguard and hilt, wrapped in a thick red twine, its envied by duelists and show-offs
Champion Sword.FreeTextOverview: It was added to the game with the April 3, 2018 update.

Chocolate.Name: Chocolate
Chocolate.FreeTextOverview: '''Chocolate''' is an event item from the historical event[[Valentines Day 2018]] that could be rewarded from eating [[Cake|cake]]. It was reintroduced with the [[Trade Union Event 2019]] and was a possible reward from boxes there. Chocolate is a consumable item that gives the player one :Stamina: stamina, but not increasing the maximum amount of stamina.

Composite Bow Shaft.Name: Composite Bow Shaft
Composite Bow Shaft.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Composite Bow.Name: Composite Bow
Composite Bow.DetailedDescription: An experimental blend of plants burned to ash, tree resin, intense thermal chilling, and wood dust, the result is a natural weapon made from nature. Some users pride themselves in not using any metal, and is certainly an achievement for the thrifty archer. Capable of firing Steel Arrows, it certainly stands up to the other bows on the same tier.

Dragon Mace Head.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Dragon Mace.Name: Dragon Mace
Dragon Mace.DetailedDescription: Breaking the norm, the Dragon Mace is decorated with teeth like spikes, mounted on a solid, fist sized orb. Each spike is curled slightly, giving a gnarled, rough appearance to the weapon. The shaft, only about a foot long, is decorated in a dragon like design, which wraps around the handle and curls off the grip in a tail like shape.

Ghost Gloves Part.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Ghost Gloves.Name: Ghost Gloves
Ghost Gloves.DetailedDescription: Similar to regular Gloves, they appear to be made of wool. Except, having 2 layers of Metallic Fiber and 3 layers of Crafted Leather spun thin as twine, and dyed white and sprinkled with filed Sapphire for a glittery effect. Similar to a trick, anyone who fails to recognize this type of glove is in for a real treat, or a stabbing.
Ghost Gloves.note: needs weight, wrapping and error checking
Ghost Gloves.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Game updates/2018-06-30|June 30th, 2018 game update]].

Ghost Helmet Fragment.Name: Ghost Helmet Fragment
Ghost Helmet Fragment.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Ghost Helmet.Name: Ghost Helmet
Ghost Helmet.DetailedDescription: An eerie translucent metal, the users face is visible through the faceplate similar to the metal of the Armor or rest of helmet. Shaped like a skull, it has an outwards curve in the rear before following the inward vertical indent of the neck. Entirely closed off, both the viewer and enemies can view inwards to see eachother in the face of combat.
Ghost Helmet.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Game updates/2018-06-30|June 30th, 2018 game update]].

Hailstorm Bow Shaft.Name: Hailstorm Bow Shaft
Hailstorm Bow Shaft.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Hailstorm Bow.Name: Hailstorm Bow
Hailstorm Bow.DetailedDescription: Designed by castle leaders and war generals, the Hailstorm Bow was taken from the idea of a blizzard. Capable of using Steel Arrows, arrows are polished until glistening, and shot in a snowstorm like hail of arrows. The bow itself is a wrap of milkstone and a mithril base, providing more power and flexibility than the tier below it.

Hamsters.Name: Hamsters
Hamsters.FreeTextOverview: Hamsters is [[Pet]] food for [[Owl]], [[Haunted]] and [[Spider]] pets.

Hunter Boots.Name: Hunter Boots
Hunter Boots.note: needs weight & wrapping added and error checking

Hunter Bow.Name: Hunter Bow
Hunter Bow.DetailedDescription: Much like the matching armor, the Hunter Bow aims for lightweight use. Mithril is forged with iron internals, to allow more flexibility rather than having a solid piece of metal bend, and roped off with a thicker piece of metal twine. Being too strong for Wooden Arrows, Steel Arrows are recommended for use.

Imperial Axe.note: needs weight, sale price & wrapping added

King's Defender.Name: King's Defender
King's Defender.DetailedDescription: The King's Defender is a tribute to the castle of which it was made. The metal, dyed and mixed with natural elements during forging, is left in castle complementary colors, and smithed with the honors of castle leadership. Recognizeable by the colors, its also customized by the warriors of each castle in any prideful way they seem fit. Cheers!
King's Defender.note: first draft of new forms page to fix '

Lightning Bow Shaft.Name: Lightning Bow Shaft
Lightning Bow Shaft.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Lightning Bow.Name: Lightning Bow
Lightning Bow.DetailedDescription: Perhaps the fastest firing bow for its tier, it's nicknamed lightning respectively. Cleanly releasing energy on firing, and able to be drawn back 25% further than the Composite or Hailstorm bow, it prides itself in being able to punch through most armors. Featuring a 'tier' like design, the ripples help conserve energy in the frame.
Lightning Bow.note: weight and wrapped to be confirmed

Lion Knife.Name: Lion Knife
Lion Knife.DetailedDescription: Matching the armor of the same name, the Lion Knife has a lion theme. About 8 inches long and rocking a clip point blade, it yells for a challenger. Two lion heads sit on each side of the hilt for intimidation, rather than gems for being flashly. The golden hilt is made from real gold, glazed with a gloss to help prevent damage to the weak metal.
Lion Knife.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Game updates/2018-06-30|June 30th, 2018 game update]].

Order Armor.Name: Order Armor
Order Armor.note: needs weight, wrapping and shop price selling
Order Armor.FreeTextOverview: It was added to the game with the April 3, 2018 update.
Order Armor.DetailedDescription: A heavyset piece of armor with a brass like tinge, its easily compared to dwarven ingot. Decorated with glory filled eagles, intricate designs of swirls and vines, and 3 sapphires on the chest, this heavy armor is top of the line for any brute that would like to hold the line and defend their castle.

Order Boots.Name: Order Boots

Order Helmet Recipe.Name: Order Helmet Recipe
Order Helmet Recipe.FreeTextOverview: It was introduced with the [[Advanced Crafting]] update.

Order Helmet.Name: Order Helmet
Order Helmet.FreeTextOverview: It was added to the game with the April 3, 2018 update.
Order Helmet.DetailedDescription: Forged in two halves, they are reinforced in the middle by a strip of metal. The neck and chin are low on the user, where it connects to the armor like a metal bracket, hooking and locking to the chestpiece. 5 indivdual latches help ensure the wearer never loses their helmet, from the horde of invaders that clamber against the walls.

Order Shield.Name: Order Shield
Order Shield.FreeTextOverview: Unlike other [[Weapon|weapons]] the {{PAGENAME}} is listed under ''Equipment'' in the [[Shop|shop]] and not weapons, but it uses the [[Weapon|Off Hand Weapon]] slot to be equipped, as all other [[Weapon|weapons]] do. It was added to the game with the April 3, 2018 update.
Order Shield.DetailedDescription: The handcrafted shield features an emblazoned emblem of your castle's symbol in gold thread, inserted into the small depths of an etching. The gold twinkles out from the bronze like overlay of the shield, triangle in shape. It sharply bends downwards, and raises in the corners to provide a wide area of protection for the castle defenders.

Skull Crusher Head.Name: Skull Crusher Head
Skull Crusher Head.note: ToDo: Fill out all these properties

Skull Crusher.Name: Skull Crusher
Skull Crusher.DetailedDescription: The Skull Crusher features a mushroom shaped hammer head, which pans out before returning inwards on a central stalk. Attached to the mushroom lips are several inch long blades, wide for blunt, penetrating power when swung. About 5 feet long, the Skull Crusher invites users to drop their shield and bash others... both shields, and people.

Stick of Wisdom.Name: Stick of Wisdom
Stick of Wisdom.DetailedDescription: A smart stick. Given out to those who helped create the encyclopedia of the land, or wiki, detailing all armors, weapons, events, craftables, resources, and parts... A laborous task. About the size of a staff, it's capped with an energizing green orb, giving the wielder extra stamina and seemingly luck. Thank you for helping!
Stick of Wisdom.FreeTextOverview: It is a a special reward given to selected players for working on the chatwars wiki. It gives +2 :Stamina: stamina and +2 :Luck: luck.

Werewolf Helmet (Event Gear).Name: Werewolf Helmet (Event Gear)
Werewolf Helmet (Event Gear).DetailedDescription: Similar to a Lion Helmet, except wolf like. A steel helmet is made as a base, before a fake mouth and skull are formed and added. With fur, it resembles a wolf's head. Offering all around protection intimidation even without a full set, many users value the animalistic style of this helmet. Users are advised to avoid adding silver trim, however.

Wooden Shield.Name: Wooden Shield
Wooden Shield.FreeTextOverview: Unlike other [[Weapon|weapons]] the {{PAGENAME}} is listed under ''Equipment'' in the [[Shop|shop]] and not weapons, but it uses the [[Weapon|Off Hand Weapon]] slot to be equipped, as all other [[Weapon|weapons]] do.
